prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon with large green leaves and a vibrant flower on its back.
I want a powerful Pokemon that has a mix of plant and poison attributes, perfect for battles.
Generate a Pokemon design featuring a big blue body and a pink flower, representing nature and strength.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a dinosaur but is predominantly green with floral elements.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a strong connection to plant life.
Design a creature that can release poisonous spores and has a strong, sturdy appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that evolves from a small plant into a giant flower-bearing beast.
